sections.heading: Coffee
items: Flatwhite: Unexpected to enoucter lovly flatewhite at a cafe called 武威堂 in Taoyuan, TW

sections.heading: Mischievous
items: Don't know why, but my mom quite often answer question beside the point. And after all the friendly reminders went in vien. That my sibilings and I started, actually i started, to do the same trick to my mom. Only found out it takes mental energy to answer a question far form the mark. Having silly fun in mundane life.

items: yeah, i know. E-scooter is nothing new. But i just test riding two e-scooters! Good stuff, but... save it for later.

joy.content: The sound of rain on the roof while reading a good book brings me immense joy. It's the perfect combination of comfort and stimulation.

sections.heading: series - Ginny and Georgia season3
items: Okie, i have been waiting so long so it’s not fair game. All i can say is I’m way too invested in this, reading reddit and watching clips and interviews on youtube. The performance of Georgia is unbelievable. Marcus, Max and others are awesome. Abby made me think of Avril Lavigne. Wolfe made me think of character Moose in Movie Step up

sections.heading: Youtube channel found
items: Coolville feat.:The Life-Sized City. It's a great production. Worth a watch. I learned so many things about my homeland from the episode about Taipei, Taiwan

FIRST.title: Recent FIRST
FIRST.intro: Something fresh in day to day.

sections.heading: First time immerse in a song
items: Playing 安九 in the earbuds. It was a commute after work. My body has gone through the heat, a work week, the long waiting for my takeaway meal and holding the pee for too long that I really gotta put my mind in a place where it can sit still with me until I get home. That the song with its bass, orchestra and repeated build up of emotion really pull me in.

sections.heading: discomfort
items: constipation… haven’t experienced this for a while. Tummy pain.I guess, more veggies for a meal and probably have to replace napping with walking after a meal.

sections.heading: Daily Gear
items: Face scarf that covers up my face while every day 15 min cycling at noon.
